page.title: 09HEALTH
page.content: {HEALTH}In Coggeshall we are lucky to have two resident Doctors,Dentists and Pharmacists.People in outlying villages have to travel into Coggeshall.The Doctor's surgery is open mornings and evenings.In emergency the Doctors will make home visits.The District Nurse and Health Visitors make rounds to check new babies,the elderly and infirm.The Dental Surgeries are open five days a week.Doctors and Dentists have treated people on the National Health Service since 1948.Before that only workers got free medical service,everyone else had to pay.It costs children nothing for medical and dental treatment because under the National Health Service if you are still at school everything is free.Adults have to pay a prescription charge and pay a contribution from their wages.
